org.apache.commons.io.monitor

类 FileAlterationListenerAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.io.monitor.FileAlterationListenerAdaptor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileAlterationListener

    public class FileAlterationListenerAdaptor
extends Object
implements FileAlterationListener
    Convenience FileAlterationListener implementation that does nothing.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    另请参阅:
    FileAlterationObserver
